# pacta.portfolio.audit

The goal of pacta.portfolio.audit is to provide utility functions that
enable the calculation of audit statistics for a PACTA analysis.

## Installation

You can install the development version of pacta.portfolio.audit like
so:

``` r
#install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("RMI-PACTA/pacta.portfolio.audit")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

``` r
library(pacta.portfolio.audit)
## basic example code
```

# Package index

## All functions

- [`add_portfolio_flags()`](https://rmi-pacta.github.io/pacta.portfolio.audit/reference/add_portfolio_flags.md)
  : Adds flags columns to a portfolio data frame
- [`calculate_portfolio_financed_emissions()`](https://rmi-pacta.github.io/pacta.portfolio.audit/reference/calculate_portfolio_financed_emissions.md)
  : Calculate the financed emissions of a portfolio, by sector and asset
  type
- [`create_ald_flag()`](https://rmi-pacta.github.io/pacta.portfolio.audit/reference/create_ald_flag.md)
  : Add columns to flag existence of data in ABCD for each holding
- [`create_audit_file()`](https://rmi-pacta.github.io/pacta.portfolio.audit/reference/create_audit_file.md)
  : Create the audit file for a processed portfolio
- [`export_audit_information_data()`](https://rmi-pacta.github.io/pacta.portfolio.audit/reference/export_audit_information_data.md)
  : Export audit data for Transition Monitor website
- [`get_entity_info()`](https://rmi-pacta.github.io/pacta.portfolio.audit/reference/get_entity_info.md)
  : A short description of the function
- [`get_input_files()`](https://rmi-pacta.github.io/pacta.portfolio.audit/reference/get_input_files.md)
  : A short description of the function
- [`left_join_entity_info()`](https://rmi-pacta.github.io/pacta.portfolio.audit/reference/left_join_entity_info.md)
  : A short description of the function
- [`portfolio_summary()`](https://rmi-pacta.github.io/pacta.portfolio.audit/reference/portfolio_summary.md)
  : A short description of the function
- [`process_raw_portfolio()`](https://rmi-pacta.github.io/pacta.portfolio.audit/reference/process_raw_portfolio.md)
  : A short description of the function
